channel.title: Using item on object problem

I KNO THIS WORKS AND THE STARD ARE THERE TO PRESERVE MY WORK. One of the places ihave tried is in the use item on object part. [b]I use testscape[/b] [code] else if(useItemID == **** && atObjectID == ****)//**** ** *** deleteItem(****, getItemSlot(***), *); // pEmote = *x***; // addItem(***, *****); // }[/code]

item.title: Using item on object problem
item.dc:creator: @k3zzer k3zzer
item.description:
@k3zzer wrote:

It’s hard to say where it begins, because it starts with “Else”.
This means it needs to start somewhere after your original code for the procedure.
It will be very difficult for anybody to give you an exact position, Because the only place it will work is after the procedure, and you need to find that EXACT procedure.

Read full topic
